level.heading: Application to Superior Court.
level.text: An application to the Superior Court for a protective order or to enforce, quash, or modify a subpoena issued by a clerk of court under ยง 13-443 shall comply with the Rules of the Superior Court and laws of the District and shall be submitted to the Superior Court.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-147, see notes following ยง 13-441.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 6 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act. See Vol. 13, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
